p: According to several studies, as shown in Table 5, the most preferred melliferous plants by beekeepers have a potent and large biological activities including antioxidant, antidiabetic, anticancer, antifungal, anti-inflammatory, and diuretic effects. It has been previously reported that the medicinal properties of bee products are highly dependent on many factors, including their botanical origins [ 74]; in fact, the diversity of their botanical sources gives them a wide range of pharmacological activities that can provide consumers a functional food product with therapeutic benefits.
